hero.title: About Arpit Brass
hero.subtitle: Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 2009
hero.description: Arpit Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer dedicated to delivering high-quality engineering solutions across multiple industrial sectors. With advanced CNC and VMC technologies, we transform complex manufacturing challenges into precise, reliable components.

meta.title: Arpit Brass - Precision Manufacturing Excellence Since 2009
meta.description: Specialized precision component manufacturer with 16 years of experience, serving automobile, hydraulic, and pneumatic industries with cutting-edge manufacturing technologies.

items.title: CNC Manufacturing Capabilities
items.description: State-of-the-art CNC machines enabling high-precision component manufacturing
items.specifications: Multi-axis machining, tight tolerance capabilities, advanced programming

items.title: VMC Manufacturing Capabilities
items.description: Precision vertical machining centers for complex component production
items.specifications: High-speed spindles, advanced cooling systems, precision tooling

items.content: Arpit Brass is a leading precision components manufacturer established in 2009, specializing in high-quality engineering solutions for automobile, hydraulic, and pneumatic industries. With 45 CNC and 15 VMC machines, we deliver exceptional manufacturing precision from our facilities in Jamnagar and Rajkot.
